turns.text: Well um we lived - I grew up in San Antonio and I was used to the heat and I was used to what couldnt grow down there and we had small um farm house out in Castroville which is just uh to the west of San Antonio --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and we did lot of gardening out there and uh mostly in raised beds so we could keep the uh soil nice because basically out there it was mostly clay soil very hard to to grow very hard to cultivate and when we came up here uh to California uh were in the Monterrey area and its very uh nice sandy soil rich soil and the weather is perfect for growing just about anything you want to grow --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: How fine
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- so weve been out here well really in the house since December and weve been uh planting flowers that we could never plant in San Antonio because the heat would just dry them up after you know about three good weeks of nice weather before the heat started --
Um

turns.text: -- and here they are supposed to last year around --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh boy
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- so we have some really pretty flowers growing and uh were at the edge of forest area so theres lot of pine mulch
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Just about anything you would want in Texas as gardener is here just around us We got here at the end of about four year drought Weve had whole lot of rain Uh its been raining pretty much continually now uh off and on maybe one day of break for about month So -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh really
turns.label: bh

turns.text: Yeah were getting replenished and so there is - when I first came here everything was yellow the grass was dead everywhere And now with all the rain everything is just gorgeous lush and green and beautiful and I hope that it holds out here after the summer
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Wow
turns.label: ba

turns.text: But uh that has been the major change that we have noticed in gardening and thats about the extent of what weve done just little bit on the patio and waiting for the rain to subside so we can mow We after about month we finally got to mow this weekend But um were just so happy to see green Its just so nice We havent really done too much else other than that
turns.label: sd
